Subskills.name: Hour of Chaos
Subskills.description: Decreases the cooldown of chaos totem.

Subskills.name: Manafunneled Chaos
Subskills.description: Chaos totem deals increased damage based on your maximum mana for each second active but drains increasing amounts of mana per second. If you run out of mana the totem despawns.

Subskills.name: Chaos Shattering
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict elemental break on hit.

Subskills.name: Doomsday Clock
Subskills.description: Increases the duration of chaos totem.

Subskills.name: Chaos Aura
Subskills.description: Monsters around the chaos totem have a chance for a chaos meteor to drop down from the sky dealing area of effect damage.

Subskills.name: Chaos Arc
Subskills.description: Chance on attack to fire multiple chaos bolts in an arc.

Subskills.name: Split Chaos
Subskills.description: Chance for chaos bolts to split into two bolts on hit.

Subskills.name: Colossal Chaos
Subskills.description: Increases the size and damage of chaos bolts.

Subskills.name: Uncontrollable Reaction
Subskills.description: Chaos totem has a chance on hit to critically strike dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: Reach of Chaos
Subskills.description: Increases the range of chaos totem.

Subskills.name: Chaos Pulse
Subskills.description: Chance to unleash a pulse of shadow on hit inflicting burning and dealing additional damage.

Subskills.name: Chaos Embodied
Subskills.description: You can summon multiple chaos totems but you can no longer summon any other totems. Chaos totem no longer has a cooldown.

Subskills.name: Arcing Destruction
Subskills.description: Chaos totem fires multiple chaos bolts in an arc.
